column4: Hi, i'm having problem hooking my ubuntu laptop on to my wireless network, it's a dell latitude D610. It works with TP cable but that is not much fun. Could somebody walk me through it? (yes i read the ubuntu-help but that wasn't much of use when it wanted to link to the wiki, duuh no internet connection!)
that is a bcm43xx wireless and they take some work.  I have a few of the 610s..  but none are running intrepid
intrepid is the latest versionof ubuntu
